series: Average monthly hearing dispositions per ALJ a

footnotes.content: Sources: Social Security Administration, Office of Disability Adjudication and Review. Actual data from the Key Workload Indicator Report.

Note: Number of ALJs and average monthly hearing dispositions per ALJ based on fiscal year average ALJ availability; average hearings pending per ALJ based on ALJs on duty. Data exclude Regional Chief ALJs.

File available from US Social Security Administration • Office of Retirement and Disability Policy • Office of Research, Evaluation, and Statistics, Annual Statistical Supplement, 2014, http://www.socialsecurity.gov/policy/docs/statcomps/supplement/2014/.
